sentence: Likewise, in the state's GOP gubernatorial primary, Republican Doug Mastriano, who advocated for the 2020 presidential election results to be overturned, appears to be the favorite to clinch the nomination to take on Democrat Josh Shapiro in November.

title: Five things to watch in North Carolina, Pennsylvania primaries

sentence: Right-wing Candidates and the 'Big Lie' Right-wing Republican candidates have performed well in Tuesday's elections, in particular Pennsylvania state Senator Doug Mastriano who will now be the party's nominee for governor.
